scenes.start: Hi! It's not convenient enough to send short notes to your Notion, is it? I'll help you with that. Through me, you can quickly and easily send notes to your inbox in Notion! I'm completely safe, I can't read and edit your notes from Notion (only create new notes) Before starting work, read a short instruction on setting up and working with me. My setup will take no more than 5 minutes. Use these commands to link me to Notion: /notion_token [API token] - Install API token Notion /notion_database [database ID] - Install the Notion inbox database I also have open source code. Administrator: @mrkeksz

note.success_update: The note has been successfully updated!
note.error_page_id:
Could not get the page being edited.
Create a new note.

scenes.help: Instructions on setting up and working with the bot. Commands /language - Change the language of the bot /notion_token [API token] - Install the API token Notion /notion_database [database ID] - Install the inbox database Notion /stats - Bot Statistics /help - Show the list of commands The bot has an open source code. Administrator: @mrkeksz

notion_token.success:
The Notion API token has been successfully installed!
Don't forget to set the Idea mailbox database ID (/notion_database [Database ID])
notion_token.invalid_command: The command was entered incorrectly. Follow the pattern: /notion_token [API token Notion]

notion_database.success:
Notion database is installed.
Don't forget to install the Notion API token (/notion_token [API token]).
notion_database.invalid_command: The command was entered incorrectly. Follow the pattern: /notion_database [Database ID]

shared.error_api:
Operation failed.
Check the installed API token Notion and the database ID.
shared.error_not_found:
Couldn't find a note in Notion.
It may have been deleted or moved to an inaccessible area.
